author: Gail Conway
title: Transport company in NI aim to spread positivity
description: Two trains in Northern Ireland have had very special makeovers in support of the Chase the Rainbow campaign.
content:
Two trains in Northern Ireland have had very special makeovers in support of the Chase the Rainbow campaign.
The Trainbows, trains wrapped in rainbows, were launched as the company aims to spread some positivity during the pandemic.
One of them made its mai… [+3538 chars]
